properties.description: Living energy field created by all life; binds the galaxy, grants power through balance and will. Syncretic bridge: Force as seidr-like wisdom (Freyja/Odin), lightsaber as Gungnir spear, Jedi Code as Hávamál counsel.

Vast, uncaring cosmos filled with elder gods (Cthulhu, Nyarlathotep) beyond human comprehension. Syncretic bridge: Cosmic indifference as Ragnarök inevitability, elder gods as Jötnar/primordial chaos (Surtr, Ymir), madness as seidr trance gone wrong.

Paul Atreides as Kwisatz Haderach — seer of all possible futures, spice-enhanced prescience. Syncretic bridge: Prophetic vision as Völuspá foresight, spice as mead of poetry, desert ecology as vaettir/land spirits.

The universal pattern of self-sacrifice to gain/transmit transformative knowledge or redemption. Odin hangs for runes; Christ dies for salvation. Both give everything to receive/give ultimate wisdom/grace.
Odin's hanging on Yggdrasil for rune-knowledge
Christ's crucifixion for humanity's salvation and knowledge of God
Thought/memory ravens witness the sacrifice for higher knowledge
Endless feast renewal echoes resurrection/redemption cycle
